Package com.example.app.serializer

Interface Serializer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the object to be serialized/deserialized.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationSerializer, EnquirySerializer, ProjectSerializer, RegistrationSerializer, StringSerializer, UserSerializer
public interface Serializer<T>
Serializer interface for serializing and deserializing objects. This interface defines methods for converting objects to a string format and vice versa.

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      String serialize(T entity)
      Serializes an object of type T into a string format.
      Parameters:
      entity - The object to serialize.
      Returns:
      The serialized string representation of the object.

    • deserialize

      T deserialize(LinkedList<String> parts) throws DataParsingException
      Deserializes a string representation of an object into an object of type T.
      Parameters:
      parts - A LinkedList of strings representing the parts of the object.
      Returns:
      The deserialized object of type T.
      Throws:
      DataParsingException - If there is an error during parsing.

    • parseIntOrNull

      default Integer parseIntOrNull(String raw)
      Parses a string into an integer. Returns null if the string is null or empty.
      Parameters:
      raw - The string to parse.
      Returns:
      The parsed integer, or null if the string is null or empty.

    • parseEnumOrNull

      default <E extends Enum<E>> E parseEnumOrNull(String raw, Class<E> enumClass)
      Parses a string into a long. Returns null if the string is null or empty.
      Parameters:
      raw - The string to parse.
      Returns:
      The parsed long, or null if the string is null or empty.
